thumb.title: [TAS] Flash 「偶然にも最悪な永野～待ち合わせ編～」 by Rxser in 00:38.92
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jfmnmT32dxo以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6510M TAS originally published on 2025-04-26 Guuzen ni mo Saiaku na Nagano ~Kouenhen~ (偶然にも最悪な永野～公園編～, Nagano Has the Worst Luck: Park Edition) is a short storybook-style Flash game by a Japanese developer known as Game Movie. All of the cutscenes are live-action, which harkens back to the brief period of full-motion video games during the 1990s, which had very similar games. You follow Nagano, a hapless man who finds himself harassed by bullies for no particular reason. It's up to you to make a choice on whether Nagano should fight back or run away.Here, Rxser (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Rxser) runs away and gets the bullies to beat up another hapless guy in record time.
